version_description: - Minor bug fixes.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Minor bug fixes.

- City Rank widget shows breakdown of the City value available
- Player Level widget now shows all unlocks per Level
- New types of missions: City value, City stats, citizen thoughts
- Attraction card upgrades now give info about available events
- Improved visibility of New missions and deliveries available
- Improved feedback for completed missions and deliveries that are ready to be claimed
- Odds to get cards from each rarity are shown when purchasing a card pack
- Misc bug fixes

- City Rank widget shows breakdown of the City value available
- Player Level widget now shows all unlocks per Level
- New types of missions: City value, City stats, citizen thoughts
- Attraction card upgrades now give info about available events
- Improved visibility of New missions and deliveries available
- Improved feedback for completed missions and deliveries that are ready to be claimed
- Odds to get cards from each rarity are shown when purchasing a card pack
- Misc bug fixes

Miscellaneous bug fixes
Miscellaneous bug fixes
Miscellaneous bug fixes
Miscellaneous bug fixes

- Goods and coins heatmaps show where all your goods are assigned and how much each building contributes to your economy respectively
- Building stats panels give details each building or decoration: impact on city growth, info on coin generation, and a breakdown of goods and decorations impact
- Easily locate any building in the city thanks to the new item locator tool
- Residential decorations now impact citizen thought rewards
- Global Leaderboards! Connect to Facebook to compete
- Misc bug fixes"

- NEW Daily Rewards: Receive a gift for logging in each day: Coins, Cash, or even Cards! Check in 7 days in a row to level up and upgrade your daily rewards permanently!
- NEW Decorations Heatmap: Visualize and optimize the placement of your decorations, so you can make the most out of their bonuses.
- NEW Rename Buildings: All structures in the game can now be given a custom name. Select a building and click on the pen and paper icon next to its name to change it.
- NEW Loading Tips: Can be seen when starting the game to help you learn a few tricks!

- NEW Colors: Customize the look of all your Homes, Stores and Factories with almost 50 color cards to unlock and collect!
- NEW Unlock Lots Early: You may now spend Cash to unlock city lots before you meet the Player Level requirement.
- NEW Card Filters: Option to only see the cards that you can place/assign, or the ones that you can upgrade.
- NEW Bundles: Card packs containing exclusively Homes, Stores, Factories, or Goods are now available in the Shop after Level 15.
- UPDATED Attractions: We revised the order that Attractions are unlocked to bring more variety and life to your City.
- UPDATED Deliveries List: New Vehicle combinations have been added to the list of available Deliveries.
- Misc bug fixes.

- NEW Winter Festivities: Snow has come to Citytopia, so grab a warm drink and embrace the chilly season!
- NEW City Edit Mode: Quickly edit the placement of your buildings, visualize their stats, store (or sell) the ones you don't need. It's never been easier to maximize your city value!
- NEW Storage: Store buildings temporarily and rebuild them later. The first structures you store will be displayed on a hot bar for even easier access!
- UPDATED Color Preview: Browse through an assortment of buildings and preview the look of your Color cards.
- UPDATED Placement Increase: Quickly identify which cards got their placement or assignment limit recently increased with a new marker in the build menu.
- UPDATED Quest Rewards: Check out the rewards of your Deliveries directly from the main list.
- UPDATED City Stats gauges: We have improved the way City Stats gauges are displayed for better readibility.

- Hints: Not sure what to do to progress? Tap the Lightbulb icon to get personalized advice! What's more, in the Build menu, Hints come with a visual cue to help you find actions that help your city right now!
- Auto-Hints settings: Familiar with the game already? An option has been added in the Settings to disable the automatic display of Hints.
- Tutorial Enhancement: During their introduction to Citytopia, new players get to experience what an advanced city looks like before starting to work on their own. How exciting!
- Revamped Ceremonies: Enjoy our brand new Level Up, Card Unlock and Pack Opening ceremonies. Leveling Up has never felt so good!
- New Missions building: The R&D center that gives you Missions established a new branch on the outskirts of Citytopia. Check out how cool it looks!
- More Coins with Ads: We have increased the number of Coins you can receive for free by watching an Ad in the Store. Get those Coins flowing!

We're excited to announce new changes for the Spring season! Here’s what you can expect in this release:

• NEW MISSION LOG — Check and complete your missions much faster with the new Mission log. This spring cleaning is the beginning of bigger things to come very soon!
• FASTER REWARD CEREMONIES — Need to go fast and skip the level up ceremonies, rewards, or even card packs? Don't wait any longer and use the Skip button to go faster than ever!
• AND MORE — Performance Improvements and Bug Fixes

We're excited to announce new changes for the Spring season! Here’s what you can expect in this release:

• NEW MISSION LOG — Check and complete your missions much faster with the new Mission log. This spring cleaning is the beginning of bigger things to come very soon!
• FASTER REWARD CEREMONIES — Need to go fast and skip the level up ceremonies, rewards, or even card packs? Don't wait any longer and use the Skip button to go faster than ever!
• AND MORE — Performance Improvements and Bug Fixes

We're excited to announce new changes for the Spring season! Here’s what you can expect in this release:

• NEW MISSION LOG — Check and complete your missions much faster with the new Mission log. This spring cleaning is the beginning of bigger things to come very soon!
• FASTER REWARD CEREMONIES — Need to go fast and skip the level up ceremonies, rewards, or even card packs? Don't wait any longer and use the Skip button to go faster than ever!

ACHIEVEMENTS — Ready for new challenges? Unlock achievements by completing new objectives and for each level completed, a great reward!
